x.y.z.about: Example. Leave this ALWAYS here!. INCLUDE ALL THE KEYS, EVEN WITH EMPTY ARRAYS!

improvements: We reverted back to no scrolling during navigations
We added a scrolling mechanism to pages
We changed the timeout for each page from 18 to 60 seconds
We changed the ndt tests input file
We changed the update script timeout from 3 to 10 minutes
We changed the NDT measurement script to not delete the NDT files after the test

fixes: We changed log message to listen to trigger end of puppeteer test

improvements: We removed adblock and resolution restrictions from experiments
We made the video and webpage dataset smaller
We removed traceroute tests to pages
We changed the experiments to navigate to all pages in the dataset per test
We made a mechanism that exits the navigation as soon as the extension data has been sent
We made the video reproduction shorter
We added progress bar data to webdriver video reproduction output file
We made it so only webpage navigations are performed

fixes: We fixed the update script, that now unblocks client in case of same version during update process
We fixed the ongoing reset script, which now unlocks client in the server side
improvements: We made better release comment parsing from the release notes

fixes: We fixed the calling of reboot scripts to be called explicitly with bash command
